description: Searches the specified directory for a user. You can find users that match the SearchString parameter with the value of their attributes included in the SearchString parameter. This operation supports pagination with the use of the NextToken request and response parameters. If more results are available, the SearchUsers.NextToken member contains a token that you pass in the next call to SearchUsers. This retrieves the next set of items. You can also specify a maximum number of return results with the MaxResults parameter.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory that's associated with the user.

parameters.name: Realm
parameters.description: The domain name that's associated with the user.

parameters.name: SearchAttributes
parameters.description: One or more data attributes that are used to search for a user. For a list of supported attributes, see Directory Service Data Attributes. (string) ---

parameters.name: SearchString
parameters.description: The attribute value that you want to search for.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory where the address block is added.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An encoded paging token for paginated calls that can be passed back to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: Realm
nested_items.description: The domain that's associated with the user.

nested_items.name: Users
nested_items.description: The user information that the request returns.

nested_items.name: DistinguishedName
nested_items.description: The distinguished name of the object.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user account is active.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The first name of the user.

nested_items.name: OtherAttributes
nested_items.description: An expression that includes one or more attributes, data types, and values of a user.

nested_items.name: BOOL
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a boolean. For example:

nested_items.name: N
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a number. For example:

nested_items.name: S
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a string. For example:

nested_items.name: SS
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a string set. For example:

nested_items.name: SID
nested_items.description: The unique security identifier (SID) of the user.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The last name of the user.

nested_items.name: UserPrincipalName
nested_items.description: The UPN that is an internet-style login name for a user and based on the internet standard RFC 822. The UPN is shorter than the distinguished name and easier to remember.
